project.name: mcover
project.description: MCover is a collection of macro-based cross-platform code coverage and quality tools.
project.version: Added caching of class list in macros to improve compilation times on large projects. Moved debug log file (and caches) to temp .mcover directory. Added @IgnoreCover classes to Compiler.include ignore list (to avoid compiling them). Fixed critical bug on Windows introduced in last release
